strings.LMaxLevel: The maximum signal level to start recording:
strings.LMaxLevelInterrupt: The number of operations to the maximum level to start recording:
strings.LMinLevel: Minimum signal for the start of auto-recognition:
strings.LEMinLevelInterrupt: The number of positives to a minimum standard for the start of auto-recognition:
strings.CBStopRecordActionItems1: Stop recording on the minimum signal level
strings.CBStopRecordActionItems2: Stop, recognize and run with the minimum signal level
strings.CBStopRecordActionItems3: Stop recording without the minimum signal level
strings.CBStopRecordActionItems4: Stop, recognize and run without the minimum signal level
strings.CBEnableSendText: Enable transmission of the text in the input field of other programs
strings.GBSendText: Setting the transmission of the text in the input fields other programs
strings.LClassName: Class input fields of the recipient:
strings.LNote: WARNING! The recognized text will be sent to the active window. Class input field can be left blank or specify using the optional SearchApplicationClassName.exe
strings.LNoteInactive: WARNING! The recognized text will be sent to the inactive window. The 'Window title' must contain an accurate and complete name of the title bar of the program receiving the data.
strings.CBEnableReplace: Replace the words in the list
strings.CBFirstLetterUpper: Take the first letter of sentence
strings.HotKeyAlredyUses: This hot key is already in use!
strings.MsgErr1: Not found the recording device. The program will be closed.
strings.MsgErr2: Command file %s not found. The program will be closed.
strings.MsgErr3: Unknown error in the thread JvThreadRecognize
strings.MsgErr4: Error! The configuration file %s not found.
strings.MsgInf1: To configure the microphone go to Control Panel.%sYour version of OS: %s
strings.MsgInf3: Command is not recognized or is not in the MSpeech database.
strings.MsgInf4: Error! No connection to the Google server
strings.MsgInf5: This line can not be removed!%sMust remain at least one command.
strings.MsgInf6: This line can not be removed!%sThere should be one rule replace text.
